meanings.definition: A colorless liquid compound used in the production of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The xylidine was essential for creating vibrant dyes.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use xylidine to make different colored dyes.
meanings.sent3: The xylidine decided to join the colorful world of dyes.
meanings.sent4: In the laboratory, xylidine danced with the molecules to create beautiful colors.
meanings.sent5: The scent of xylidine lingered in the air, a reminder of its dye-making role.

meanings.definition: Any of various derivatives of xylidine.
meanings.sent1: She studied the different derivatives of xylidine in chemistry class.
meanings.sent2: The market offers various derivatives of xylidine for different purposes.
meanings.sent3: The party of xylidine derivatives gathered for a chemical celebration.
meanings.sent4: The derivatives of xylidine branched out into unique chemical pathways.
meanings.sent5: Each derivative of xylidine had its own distinct chemical identity.
